title: The Master Algorithm
itunes:title: The Master Algorithm
description: Tim O'Reilly, the founder of O’Reilly Media and author of the book, What's the Future?, talks about how new technology can either be considered a scapegoat or a mirror and what this means for our future.
content:encoded: Tim O'Reilly, the founder of O’Reilly Media and author of the book, What's the Future?, talks about how new technology can either be considered a scapegoat or a mirror and what this means for our future.

itunes:author: Institute for New Economic Thinking (INET)
